task.title: Named User License Registration with XML File

taskbody.context: This procedure is designed to help system administrators register the application for multiple users, without the hassle of configuring the application licensing for each of them.

cmd.ph: Register for the currently logged user, using the Named User License Registration procedure.

ph.product: author authorEclipse authorSDK developer developerEclipse editor editorEclipse

cmd.ph: Depending on your license type, register for the currently logged user, using one of the following procedures:

choices.product: author authorEclipse developer developerEclipse editor editorEclipse
choices.choice: Request a Floating License from a License Server Running as a Standalone Process or Request a Floating License from a License Server Running as a Java Servlet, if you have a floating license key.

step.cmd: Copy the license.xml file from the preferences directory of to its installation directory (or its lib sub-directory).
For each installation of (either on the same computer or on different computers) repeat step 2.
